name: pink-scarf
effect: Held: Increases the holder’s Cuteness during a Super Contest’s Visual Competition.
short_effect: Raises the holder’s Cuteness while in a contest.

flavor_text.sun-moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. During a contest, it raises the Cute aspect of the Pokémon holding it.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. During a contest, it raises the Cute aspect of the Pokémon holding it.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: An item to be held by a Pokémon. During a contest, it raises the Cute aspect of the Pokémon holding it.
